Address.label: Address
Address.value: MIDDLE JIANNAN BOULEVARD 16TH FLOOR, SHIHAO SQUARE, CHENGDU, 610000, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Senmiao Technology Ltd is a holding company. The company's operating segment includes Automobile Transaction and Related Services and Online ride-hailing platform Services. It generates maximum revenue from the Automobile Transaction and Related Services segment. Geographically, it derives revenue from China.
